local_intent: Ensure contact with the T block by lowering until contact, after visibility check, alignment, and yaw set; then verify contact is detected.
assumptions: Yaw 90 deg is the desired pushing orientation
Contact threshold 10 is sufficient to detect touch
coherence_with_global: Implements the pre-push contact phase: align to t_block, set yaw=90, perform LowerUntilContact with speed=normal, max_depth=0.02, force_threshold=10, timeout_ms=800, and verify contact before subsequent pushes.
